name: allSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn on switch”
”Alexa, dim lights to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
allSmart Home is the smart home skill from FCoral Innovations S.A. that gives you the ability to control smart devices added to allSmart Home through your voice.

 

Here is what you need to do:

1. Download the allSmart Home mobile application and add all the smart devices to the app.

2. Open Amazon Alexa app and enable “allSmart Home” skill.

3 Sign in with an allSmart Home account.

4. When Alexa and allSmart Home are successfully linked, press the “Discover Devices” button to discover all devices.
